medical_history.chief_complaint: Patient is requesting dietary recommendations to reduce LDL cholesterol.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has tried 4 different statin drugs in the past 2 years, each causing insidious onset of lethargy, fatigue, and achiness that resolves within 1 week of stopping the drug.
medical_history.past_medical_history: High LDL levels (LDL 205 mg/dL) and total cholesterol level of 289 mg/dL; no relevant past medical conditions specified.
medical_history.family_history: Both parents died in their 80s from massive strokes; an older brother had a stroke at age 60.
